about_the_game:
On an asteroid at the rim of a space civilization, a relic from centuries past awakens. With creaks and groans of rusted metal, it resumes its directives, this time with an awareness it never had prior...

  • Incremental and idle progress based off of peak performances, rewarding builds that reach peak production for a few seconds

  • An optimization minigame that revolves around timing different tasks such as surveying, mining, moving, smelting, and crafting

  • 100+ upgrades to purchase and improve production and efficiency

  • A remort/restart system that grants semi-permanent awards for the next run

  • A crafting system similar to action RPGs like Path of Exile, Last Epoch, and the Diablo series with using currency resources to roll item modiifers on item bases

  • A high risk high reward space auto battle system with ships being permanently destroyed on loss but gain great resources on success

Developer's Note

This is our first game and there will be at least six months of fixes and additional content before any other plans are taken. The roadmap ahead:

  • A logistics system involving sending and receiving payloads at different sites

  • An overarching narrative with multiple endings explaining what happened in the centuries that followed

  • A faction war and reputation system that rewards handling challenging new mechanics and resources

  • ...and much more content (resources, upgrades, effects, stats, ships, equipment, etc.)
